pageProduct.name: Alkira 8 Glycolic Resurfing Gel Exfoliator 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits:
• 8% Glycolic acid to reduce clogged pores and remove complexion dulling, dead skin cells.
• Natural fruit AHAs to resurface and refine skin’s texture, visibly reducing the appearance of blemishes
• Enriched with a radiance enhancing Australian native vitamin C complex of Kakadu Plum, Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar
• A gentle gel finished with Coconut, Aloe Vera, Mango, Cucumber and Chamomile to leave skin clear, clean and soft

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Coco-Glucoside, Cellulose Gum, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Matricaria Chamomilia Flower (Chamomile) Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral*, Limonene* Allergens

Directions

Use 2-3 times per week, in the PM. Apply to damp, freshly cleansed skin. Leave on the skin for a few minutes to allow the Glycolic and fruit acids to penetrate. Rinse with warm water and follow with serum/face oil and then either the Moisture Restoring Night Cream or Antioxidant Night Cream.
